description: Gets the file system association information. This operation is only supported for FSx File Gateways.

nested_items.name: FileSystemAssociationInfoList
nested_items.description: An array containing the FileSystemAssociationInfo data type of each file system association to be described.

nested_items.name: FileSystemAssociationARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the file system association.

nested_items.name: LocationARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the backend Amazon FSx file system used for storing file data. For information, see FileSystem in the Amazon FSx API Reference.

nested_items.name: FileSystemAssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the file system association. Valid Values: AVAILABLE | CREATING | DELETING | FORCE_DELETING | UPDATING | ERROR.

nested_items.name: AuditDestinationARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the storage used for the audit logs.

nested_items.name: GatewayARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway. Use the  ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of up to 50 tags assigned to the SMB file share, sorted alphabetically by key name. Each tag is a key-value pair.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: Tag key. The key can't start with aws:.

nested_items.name: CacheAttributes
nested_items.description: The refresh cache information for the file share or FSx file systems.

nested_items.name: CacheStaleTimeoutInSeconds
nested_items.description: Refreshes a file share's cache by using Time To Live (TTL). TTL is the length of time since the last refresh after which access to the directory would cause the file gateway to first refresh that directory's contents from the Amazon S3 bucket or Amazon FSx file system. The TTL duration is in seconds.

nested_items.name: EndpointNetworkConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifies network configuration information for the gateway associated with the Amazon FSx file system.

nested_items.name: IpAddresses
nested_items.description: A list of gateway IP addresses on which the associated Amazon FSx file system is available.

nested_items.name: FileSystemAssociationStatusDetails
nested_items.description: An array containing the FileSystemAssociationStatusDetail data type, which provides detailed information on file system association status.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code for a given file system association status.
